backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with access-controlled user profiles, push subscriptions, stream checks, and storing user song requests.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing auto‑generated short summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Docs describing a TypeScript build failure in App.tsx caused by Node.js typings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining PWA metadata, icons, Cast SDK, and a recovery UI for failed React mounts.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching of static and background assets, cache cleanup, and push notifications.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script to catch build issues.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node script that validates frontend build assets, checks for TypeScript config, forbidden NodeJS.Timeout usage, and verifies background asset references and service worker configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with error boundary, navigation, and playback logic, integrating multiple hooks for streaming, notifications, service worker, and UI screens.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button that starts or stops casting, shows status, and tracks cast events.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt handler that detects platform/browser, listens for install events, and shows platform-specific install guides.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar with tabs for Home, Shows, and Settings, highlighting the active tab.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Compact player bar showing track info, album art, and play/pause control with tap-to-open full player.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Animated marquee component for scrolling long track titles with motion preferences and interaction controls.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Simple volume slider synced with an audio element and updating its volume.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: UI panel for enabling and managing push notifications, showing subscription state and errors.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form allowing users to submit a song request or shoutout, validating input and handling API submission states.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner that alerts users about service worker load errors or updates and provides actions to reload or reset the app.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: A share button that uses Web Share API with a fallback modal allowing users to copy a link to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Show card displaying image, details, genres, and schedule, clickable to open more info.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: A red animated badge indicating live status with radio icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Small pulsing dot showing on-air or active status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays styled notifications for currently playing tracks with icons and optional dismiss action.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Mock data defining Show type and a list of sample radio shows with metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Tracks page visibility and focus to auto‑resume audio playback and signals when manual resume is needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Initializes and manages Chromecast sessions, tracks availability and casting state, and loads media to a Cast device.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Stores and toggles a single favorite station flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity auth, managing login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Measures text and container widths to determine overflow and compute marquee animation properties.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Detects track, mix, and live changes from now‑playing data and shows deduplicated web notifications when permitted.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles subscribing and unsubscribing to push notifications using a service worker and storing subscriptions in the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for stream URL retrieval with fallback logic, stream availability checks, now-playing data, and submitting user requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, reset operations, and related state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a countdown sleep timer that pauses an audio element when time expires.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Handles acquiring and releasing the screen wake lock based on activity state and visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, responsive background images, and layout styles including overlays and safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Displays a filterable list of mock shows with genre and day filters and triggers selection actions.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: Live radio home screen UI with play/pause logic, connection state handling, and now‑playing display.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Full‑screen now‑playing view with album art, marquee title, playback controls, volume, and sleep timer.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings screen providing notification controls and a background‑image cache refresh utility.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Show details view displaying show metadata, image, schedule, and calendar download option.
Startup diagnostics collector showing an overlay for critical resource/script errors before React mounts.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Safe Google Analytics helpers for checking gtag availability and tracking playback and cast events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates an ICS calendar file for a radio show and includes helpers to compute the next show date and format timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Validates and normalizes artwork URLs, converting them to absolute HTTPS paths or returning null if invalid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, screens, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, requirements, and image asset needs for background handling.
